## DialogMetadataSelectorComponent class

Component for rendering dialog metadata selector

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DialogMetadataSelectorComponent implements DialogMetadataSelector<BasicTableMetadata<GridColumn>>, GridPluginGeneric<DialogMetadataSelectorOptions<BasicTableMetadata<GridColumn>>>, OnDestroy 
```
